official_title: To amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to make the Resolution Trust Corporation subject to the Federal Acquisition Regulation.
short_title: Resolution Trust Corporation Procurement Regulation Act of 1990

summary.text: Resolution Trust Corporation Procurement Regulation Act of 1990 - Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to subject the Resolution Trust Corporation to the Federal Acquisition Regulation issued under the Federal Procurement Policy Act.
